attributes.action: to bring back the chillis galore forum colours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned dont like the new colour green bring back the old brown colours of the chillis galore forums.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
